Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Mental Health, Mental Retardation, Alcoholism, Drug Abuse and Disability Services

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Mental Health, Mental Retardation, Alcoholism, Drug Abuse and Disability Services

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a sign at inaccessible building entrances, public toilets, and elevators giving directions to the nearest available accessible entrance or facility for persons with disabilities when such  entrance or facility exists.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Requiring a sign at inaccessible building entrances, public toilets, and elevators giving directions to the nearest available accessible entrance or facility for persons with disabilities.
